ticker: Join the new Bass Station group! https://vrc.group/BASS.2844
Live DJs and music every other Friday!
Fun facts: Did you know the Synthwave aesthetic was invented when someone turned on 'Wireframe' mode and forgot to turn it off before shipping?
Fun facts: the technical term for a gryphon with a wolf behind is called a 'lupogryph'. The technical term for a gryphon in a wolf behind is called a good date night.
Fun facts: Last year, Sterling held a much smaller gathering of just some close corvid friends. The party was broken up by police though due to the attempted murder.

ticker: This party terminates here!
Thank you all for coming!

Fun fact: Sterling recently got the Moonfang avatar. Known for having only 30 braincells, his adoption of it in to his roster marks the only known instance of someone gaining intelligence while wearing that base.
Fun fact: One of Sterling's favourite bands is Daft Punk, and like them is always looking to be Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger. - You can guess which of those he is this evening.
Fun fact: One of Sterling's role models is called Horatio. However, nobody to this day has ever heard Sterling recite a single piece of Hamlet.
Fun fact: Sterling's headstone will feature the phrase 'Hold on, I'm going to do something really stupid...'
